title: LGBT+ History Walking Tour
description:
Meet outside King’s College and the tour will finish at the Anchor pub, Silver Street

Come and walk with us on a LGBT+ history tour of Cambridge. The tour will feature some of Cambridge’s famous and more closeted LGBT haunts including both University and town sites. Profits from the tour will go to local LGBT youth charity the Kite Trust (formerly known as SexYOUality). This tour is part of the Cambridge History Festival run by the Museum of Cambridge. Please call (01223 355159) or email the Museum (enquiries@museumofcambridge.org.uk) to book
